articles.description: Ben Godfrey, 25, was killed in a tragic accident at Donington Park while competing a track day, the event's organisers have confirmed
articles.content:
British Superbike Championship rider Ben Godfrey has tragically been killed at a track day at Donington Park, aged just 25.
The professional motorcyclist fell from his bike while competing at the No… [+1529 chars]
